# Flow Diagrams (Uso)

Quando o Factory receber a documentacao completa, ele deve gerar:
- Um fluxo do frontend
- Um fluxo do backend

Formato recomendado: Mermaid.

Local sugerido:
- `factory-workflow/docs/projects/<projeto>/architecture/frontend-flow.md`
- `factory-workflow/docs/projects/<projeto>/architecture/backend-flow.md`

Use os templates:
- `factory-workflow/docs/templates/frontend-flow.template.md`
- `factory-workflow/docs/templates/backend-flow.template.md`
